/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering buildings and busy traffic. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street is filled with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The buildings lining the street are tall and modern, showcasing the architectural style of the city. In the background, trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape.
